    SELECTED COURSES 9 Edit 

     
                    
                    .student-card {
                        position: relative;
                        width: 100%;
                        max-width: 240px;
                        &.with-hover {
                        	.school-id-hover {
                        		@include opacity(0);
                        		@include prefix(transition, all 150ms ease-in-out, webkit moz ms o);
                        		position: absolute;
                        		z-index: 10;
                        		top: 0;
                        		left: 0;
                        		width: 100%;
                        		height: 100%;
                        		&:hover, &:focus {
                        			@include opacity(1);
                        		}
                        		> span {
                        			@include opacity(.95);
                        			position: absolute;
                        			top: 0;
                        			left: 0;
                        			width: 100%;
                        			height: 100%;
                        			border-radius: 10px;
                        			color: white;
                        		}
                        		> div {
                        			@include flex;
                        			@include flex-wrap;
                        			@include flex-center;
                        			width: 100%;
                        			height: 100%;
                        			padding: 15px;
                        			font-size: 18px;
                        			font-weight: 600;
                        		}
                        	}
                        }
                        > svg {
                        	display: block;
                        	width: 100%;
                        	max-width: 100%;
                        	height: auto;
                        }
                        .school-id-inside {
                        	position: absolute;
                        	top: 0;
                        	left: 0;
                        	width: 100%;
                        	height: 100%;
                        	.school-id-top {
                        		position: relative;
                        		z-index: 10;
                        		height: 30%;
                        		border-top-left-radius: 10px;
                        		border-top-right-radius: 10px;
                        		background-color: $shamrock;
                        		.user-icon {
                        			position: absolute;
                        			bottom: -32px;
                        			left: 15px;
                        			width: 64px;
                        			height: 64px;
                        			border-width: 2px;
                        			background-color: white;
                        		}
                        	}
                        	.school-id-bottom {
                        		@include flex;
                        		@include flex-wrap;
                        		height: 70%;
                        		background: rgba(white, .8);
                        		border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
                        		border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
                        		padding: 10px 15px;
                        		text-align: right;
                        		line-height: 1.1;
                        		* {
                        			color: $slate;
                        		}
                        		h1, h2 {
                        			width: 100%;
                        			margin: 0!important;
                        		}
                        		h1 {
                        			font-size: 20px;
                        			font-weight: 600;
                        		}
                        		h2 {
                        			font-size: 14px;
                        			font-weight: 600;
                        			+ h2 {
                        				font-weight: 400;
                        			}
                        		}
                        		h3 {
                        			@include flex;
                        			@include flex-center;
                        			@include prefix(align-self, flex-end, webkit);
                        			width: 100%;
                        			font-size: 16px;
                        			font-weight: 600;
                        			margin: 0!important;
                        			span:first-child {
                        				display: block;
                        				white-space: nowrap;
                        				width: 150px;
                        			}
                        			span:nth-child(2) {
                        				@include round;
                        				@include flex;
                        				@include flex-center;
                        				width: 25px;
                        				height: 24px;
                        				background: $shamrock;
                        				color: white;
                        				font-size: 12px;
                        				margin: 0 10px;
                        			}
                        			a {
                        				@include opacity(.5);
                        				display: block;
                        				width: 26px;
                        				font-size: 14px;
                        				&:hover, &:focus {
                        					@include opacity(1);
                        				}
                        			}
                        		}
                        		> div {
                        			@include prefix(align-self, flex-start, webkit);
                        			width: 100%;
                        		}
                        	}
                        }
                    }

         .university-card { position: relative; margin: 0 auto; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; &.with-hover { .school-card-hover { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; z-index: 7; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; &:hover, &:focus { @include opacity(1); } > span { @include opacity(.95); position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 10px; color: white; } > div { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; } } } .rect { display: block; } input { position: absolute; z-index: 7; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; cursor: pointer; } .school-card-inside { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; .school-card-border { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: 6; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-width: 2px; border-style: solid; border-radius: 10px; } .school-card-top { position: relative; z-index: 3; height: calc(100% / 3); background-color: $slate; border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0; .school-card-icon { @include round; @include flex; @include flex-center; position: absolute; left: 50%; margin-left: -32px; z-index: 5; top: 15px; width: 64px; height: 64px; background-position: center; background-size: cover; background-color: white; border: 3px solid $slate; .school-card-icon-bg { @include opacity(0); @include round; transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 6; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } .school-card-state { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; z-index: 7; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; svg { @include round; transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; path { @include svg-stroke(white, 10); } } &:last-child { svg { @include opacity(0); transform: rotate(45deg); } } } } &:after { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; content: ""; position: absolute; z-index: 4; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(white,.8); border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0; } } .school-card-main { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; position: relative; height: calc(100% / 3 * 2); background: white; border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px; overflow: hidden; color: $slate; .school-card-map { @include opacity(.2); @include center-x; bottom: 0; z-index: 2; width: 100%; height: 171%; border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px; overflow: hidden; img { display: block; width: 100%; } } .school-card-color { @include opacity(.1); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; z-index: 1; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px; overflow: hidden; } .school-card-info { position: relative; z-index: 4; padding-top: 30px; } .school-card-footer { @include listless; @include opacity(0); @include flex; @include flex-center; transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; align-self: flex-end; position: relative; z-index: 4; height: 36px; width: 100%; background: rgba(white,.4); border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px; color: white; li { @include flex; @include flex-center; width: calc(100% / 3); font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; text-align: center; span { display: block; } svg { display: block; margin-right: 5px; width: 28px; height: 28px; path { @include svg-stroke(white, 5); } } } } h1, h2 { transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; text-align: center; margin: 0 !important; } h1 { font-size: 28px; font-weight: 900; &:first-letter { text-transform: uppercase; } + h1 { position: absolute; top: 30px; color: rgba($charcoal,.4); width: 100%; } } &.no-footer { .school-card-info { padding-top: 15px; } h1 + h1 { top: 15px; } } h2 { font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; span { &:first-child { text-transform: capitalize; } &:last-child { text-transform: uppercase; } } } } } input:hover + .school-card-inside { .school-card-top { .school-card-icon { .school-card-icon-bg { @include opacity(.7); } .school-card-state { @include opacity(1); } } } } input:checked:hover + .school-card-inside { .school-card-top { .school-card-icon { .school-card-state { &:not(:last-child) { svg { @include opacity(0); } } &:last-child { svg { @include opacity(1); } } } } } } input:checked + .school-card-inside { .school-card-border { @include opacity(1); } .school-card-top { .school-card-icon { .school-card-icon-bg { @include opacity(.7); } .school-card-state { @include opacity(1); } } } } }     School Card Hover Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

         .university-card { position: relative; margin: 0 auto; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; &.with-hover { .school-card-hover { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; z-index: 7; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; &:hover, &:focus { @include opacity(1); } > span { @include opacity(.95); position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 10px; color: white; } > div { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; } } } .rect { display: block; } input { position: absolute; z-index: 7; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; cursor: pointer; } .school-card-inside { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; .school-card-border { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: 6; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-width: 2px; border-style: solid; border-radius: 10px; } .school-card-top { position: relative; z-index: 3; height: calc(100% / 3); background-color: $slate; border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0; .school-card-icon { @include round; @include flex; @include flex-center; position: absolute; left: 50%; margin-left: -32px; z-index: 5; top: 15px; width: 64px; height: 64px; background-position: center; background-size: cover; background-color: white; border: 3px solid $slate; .school-card-icon-bg { @include opacity(0); @include round; position: absolute; z-index: 7; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; svg { @include round; transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; path { @include svg-stroke(white, 10); } } &:last-child { svg { @include opacity(0); transform: rotate(45deg); } } } } &:after { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; content: ""; position: absolute; z-index: 4; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(white,.8); border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0; } } .school-card-main { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; position: relative; height: calc(100% / 3 * 2); background: white; border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px; overflow: hidden; color: $slate; .school-card-map { @include opacity(.2); @include center-x; bottom: 0; z-index: 2; width: 100%; height: 171%; border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px; overflow: hidden; img { display: block; width: 100%; } } .school-card-color { @include opacity(.1); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; z-index: 1; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px; overflow: hidden; } .school-card-info { position: relative; z-index: 4; padding-top: 30px; } .school-card-footer { @include listless; @include opacity(0); @include flex; @include flex-center; transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; align-self: flex-end; position: relative; z-index: 4; height: 36px; width: 100%; background: rgba(white,.4); border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px; color: white; li { @include flex; @include flex-center; width: calc(100% / 3); font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; text-align: center; span { display: block; } svg { display: block; margin-right: 5px; width: 28px; height: 28px; path { @include svg-stroke(white, 5); } } } } h1, h2 { transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; text-align: center; margin: 0 !important; } h1 { font-size: 28px; font-weight: 900; &:first-letter { text-transform: uppercase; } + h1 { position: absolute; top: 30px; color: rgba($charcoal,.4); width: 100%; } } &.no-footer { .school-card-info { padding-top: 15px; } h1 + h1 { top: 15px; } } h2 { font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; span { &:first-child { text-transform: capitalize; } &:last-child { text-transform: uppercase; } } } } } input:hover + .school-card-inside { .school-card-top { .school-card-icon { .school-card-icon-bg { @include opacity(.7); } .school-card-state { @include opacity(1); } } } } input:checked:hover + .school-card-inside { .school-card-top { .school-card-icon { .school-card-state { &:not(:last-child) { svg { @include opacity(0); } } &:last-child { svg { @include opacity(1); } } } } } } input:checked + .school-card-inside { .school-card-border { @include opacity(1); } .school-card-top { .school-card-icon { .school-card-icon-bg { @include opacity(.7); } .school-card-state { @include opacity(1); } } } } }     Course Card Default Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

         .course-card { display: block; position: relative; text-align: center; > svg { background: white; border-radius: 2px; } .course-card-inside { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; position: absolute; z-index: 2; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; text-align: center; h2 { font-size: 14px; font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 5px; } h1 { margin: 0; font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; } } .course-card-hover { transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 1; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 2px; } .course-card-border { transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: 3; width: 100%; height: 5px; border-radius: 0 0 2px 2px; } .course-card-count { @include flex; @include flex-center; transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; z-index: 9; width: 32px; height: 32px; color: white; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; border-radius: 0 2px 0 16px; overflow: hidden; span { @include flex; @include flex-center; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 0 2px 0 16px; } svg { z-index: 11; display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 6px; * { @include svg-stroke(white, 10); } } } input { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: 10; width: 100%; height: 100%; cursor: pointer; ~ .course-card-count { @include opacity(0); span { @include opacity(.5); } } &:hover { ~ .course-card-count { @include opacity(1); span { @include opacity(.5); } } } &:active, &:checked { ~ .course-card-count { @include opacity(1); span { @include opacity(1); } } } } &.with-hover { .course-card-hover { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 7; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; &:hover, &:focus { @include opacity(1); } > span { @include opacity(.95); position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 2px; color: white; } > div { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; position: relative; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; color: white; } } } } a.course-card { .course-card-hover { @include opacity(0); display: block; } &:hover, &:focus { .course-card-inside { h1, h2 { color: white!important; } } .course-card-count { span { background: rgba(white, .6)!important; } } .course-card-hover { @include opacity(.95); } .course-card-border { background: white!important; } } &:active { .course-card-hover { background: lighten($slate, 15%)!important; } } }     Course Card Link & Badge Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

    .course-card { display: block; position: relative; text-align: center; > svg { background: white; border-radius: 2px; } .course-card-inside { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; position: absolute; z-index: 2; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; text-align: center; h2 { font-size: 14px; font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 5px; } h1 { margin: 0; font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; } } .course-card-hover { transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 1; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 2px; } .course-card-border { transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: 3; width: 100%; height: 5px; border-radius: 0 0 2px 2px; } .course-card-count { @include flex; @include flex-center; transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; z-index: 9; width: 32px; height: 32px; color: white; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; border-radius: 0 2px 0 16px; overflow: hidden; span { @include flex; @include flex-center; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 0 2px 0 16px; } svg { z-index: 11; display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 6px; * { @include svg-stroke(white, 10); } } } input { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: 10; width: 100%; height: 100%; cursor: pointer; ~ .course-card-count { @include opacity(0); span { @include opacity(.5); } } &:hover { ~ .course-card-count { @include opacity(1); span { @include opacity(.5); } } } &:active, &:checked { ~ .course-card-count { @include opacity(1); span { @include opacity(1); } } } } &.with-hover { .course-card-hover { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 7; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; &:hover, &:focus { @include opacity(1); } > span { @include opacity(.95); position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 2px; color: white; } > div { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; position: relative; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; color: white; } } } } a.course-card { .course-card-hover { @include opacity(0); display: block; } &:hover, &:focus { .course-card-inside { h1, h2 { color: white!important; } } .course-card-count { span { background: rgba(white, .6)!important; } } .course-card-hover { @include opacity(.95); } .course-card-border { background: white!important; } } &:active { .course-card-hover { background: lighten($slate, 15%)!important; } } }     Course Card Hover Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

    .course-card { display: block; position: relative; text-align: center; > svg { background: white; border-radius: 2px; } .course-card-inside { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; position: absolute; z-index: 2; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; text-align: center; h2 { font-size: 14px; font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 5px; } h1 { margin: 0; font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; } } .course-card-hover { transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 1; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 2px; } .course-card-border { transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: 3; width: 100%; height: 5px; border-radius: 0 0 2px 2px; } .course-card-count { @include flex; @include flex-center; transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; z-index: 9; width: 32px; height: 32px; color: white; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; border-radius: 0 2px 0 16px; overflow: hidden; span { @include flex; @include flex-center; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 0 2px 0 16px; } svg { z-index: 11; display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 6px; * { @include svg-stroke(white, 10); } } } input { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: 10; width: 100%; height: 100%; cursor: pointer; ~ .course-card-count { @include opacity(0); span { @include opacity(.5); } } &:hover { ~ .course-card-count { @include opacity(1); span { @include opacity(.5); } } } &:active, &:checked { ~ .course-card-count { @include opacity(1); span { @include opacity(1); } } } } &.with-hover { .course-card-hover { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 7; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; &:hover, &:focus { @include opacity(1); } > span { @include opacity(.95); position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 2px; color: white; } > div { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; position: relative; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; color: white; } } } } a.course-card { .course-card-hover { @include opacity(0); display: block; } &:hover, &:focus { .course-card-inside { h1, h2 { color: white!important; } } .course-card-count { span { background: rgba(white, .6)!important; } } .course-card-hover { @include opacity(.95); } .course-card-border { background: white!important; } } &:active { .course-card-hover { background: lighten($slate, 15%)!important; } } }     Course Card Checkbox Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

         .course-card { display: block; position: relative; text-align: center; > svg { background: white; border-radius: 2px; } .course-card-inside { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; } } .course-card-hover { transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 1; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 2px; } .course-card-border { transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: 3; width: 100%; height: 5px; border-radius: 0 0 2px 2px; } .course-card-count { @include flex; overflow: hidden; span { @include flex; @include flex-center; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 0 2px 0 16px; } svg { z-index: 11; display: block; width: 100%; } } } } &.with-hover { .course-card-hover { @include opacity(0); transition: all 150ms ease-in-out; display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 7; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; &:hover, &:focus { @include opacity(1); } > span { @include opacity(.95); position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 2px; color: white; } > div { @include flex; @include flex-wrap; @include flex-center; position: relative; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 15px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; color: white; } } } } a.course-card { .course-card-hover { @include opacity(0); display: block; } &:hover, &:focus { .course-card-inside { h1, h2 { color: white!important; } } .course-card-count { span { background: rgba(white, .6)!important; } } .course-card-hover { @include opacity(.95); } .course-card-border { background: white!important; } } &:active { .course-card-hover { background: lighten($slate, 15%)!important; } } }     Profile Card Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

    .tab-bar { background: $charcoal; // sliding tab bar @include flex; @include flex-center; > div { @include flex; position: relative; margin: 0 7.5px; a { @include flex; @include flex-center; width: 165px; width: 100%; background: none!important; &::-webkit-slider-thumb { @include round; @include appearance; margin-top: -5px; height: 20px; width: 20px; background: white; cursor: pointer; } &::-moz-range-thumb { @include round;     input[type=range] { @include appearance; width: 100%; background: none!important; &::-webkit-slider-thumb { @include round; @include appearance; margin-top: -5px; height: 20px; width: 20px; background: white; cursor: pointer; } &::-moz-range-thumb { @include round; @include appearance; margin-top: -5px; height: 20px; width: 20px; background: white; cursor: pointer; } &::-ms-range-thumb { @include round; @include appearance; } &:focus::-webkit-slider-runnable-track { background: rgba(white,.4); } &::-moz-range-track { @include round; width: 100%; height: 10px; cursor: pointer; background: rgba(white,.2); } &::-ms-track { width: 100%; cursor: pointer; background: transparent; border-color: transparent; color: transparent; height: 10px; border: 0; } &::-ms-fill-lower { @include round; background: rgba(white,.3); } &:focus::-ms-fill-lower { background: rgba(white,.5); bottom: 0; width: 0; height: 0; border: 10px solid transparent; } } &.white { div { background: white; } } button { position: relative; z-index: 10; height: auto; padding: 10px 15px; font-size: 18px; } &:active { background: mix($shamrock, $slate); color: white; } } &.tooltip-top { div { &::after { @include center-x; top: -20px; border-bottom-color: rgba(white,.9); } } &.white { div { &::after { border-bottom-color: white; } } } } &.tooltip-bottom { div { &::after { @include center-x; bottom: -20px; border-top-color: rgba(white,.9); } } &.white { div { &::after { border-top-color: white; } } } button { &::after { @include prefix(transition, all 150ms ease-in-out); @include center-x; content: ""; width: 0; height: 0; border: 10px solid transparent; bottom: -20px; border-top-color: $shamrock; } &:hover, &:focus { &::after { border-top-color: mix($shamrock, white); } } &:active { &::after { border-top-color: mix($shamrock, $slate); } } } } &.tooltip-left { div { &::after { @include center-y; left: -20px; border-right-color: rgba(white,.9); } } &.white { div { &::after { border-right-color: white; } } } } &.tooltip-right { div { &::after { @include center-y; right: -20px; border-left-color: rgba(white,.9); } } &.white { div { &::after { border-left-color: white; } } } } }     Ribbon Default Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

} } &.bg-slate { background: mix($slate, white, 70%); color: white; &:after { border-color: mix($slate, white, 70%); } } &.bg-taupe { background: mix($taupe, white, 75%); color: white; &:after { border-color: mix($taupe, white, 75%); } } &.bg-campus { background: mix($campus, $slate); color: white; &:after { border-color: mix($campus, $slate); } } &.bg-shamrock { background: mix($shamrock, $slate); color: white; &:after { border-color: mix($shamrock, $slate); } } &.bg-robin { background: mix($robin, $slate); color: white; &:after { border-color: mix($robin, $slate); } } &.bg-lake { background: mix($lake, $slate); color: white; &:after { border-color: mix($lake, $slate); } } &.bg-moxie { background: mix($moxie, $slate); color: white; &:after { border-color: mix($moxie, $slate); } } &.bg-crimson { background: mix($crimson, $slate); color: white; &:after { border-color: mix($crimson, $slate); } } &.bg-auburn, &.bg-delivery { background: mix($auburn, $slate); color: white; &:after { border-color: mix($auburn, $slate); } } &.bg-orange, &.bg-freelancing { background: mix($orange, $slate); color: white;     6 Reviews

    Gurus 3
